# Counting | Functions

## Gamma function

Implementation of the gamma function using the Lanczos approximation using $g=8$
```{math}
\Gamma(z+1)\approx\sqrt{2\pi}\left(z+\frac92\right)^{z+\frac12}\exp\left(-z-\frac92\right)\sum_{k=0}^7\frac{c_k}{z+k}
```
```fck
def gamma(float z) -> float { ... }
```

## Checyshev polynomials of the first kind


## Permutation signature

Signature of a permutation of a set.
```{math}
\mathrm{sgn}(\sigma)=(-1)^{N(\sigma)}
```

## Identity matrix function

Returns the $n\times n$ identity matrix
